profile.primary_concern: concerns about medication interactions and mental health stability

context: The user is living with schizophrenia, which sometimes affects his ability to focus and remember medication routines. He worries about how PrEP might interact with his current medications and whether it would add to his anxiety. Additionally, he feels hesitant to discuss his sexual health due to stigma surrounding both his mental health condition and PrEP.
example_questions_clean: Can PrEP be safely taken with my current mental health medications?
What are the side effects of PrEP that I should be aware of?
How can I manage my anxiety when starting a new medication like PrEP?
Are there any support groups for people on PrEP who also have mental health conditions?
What steps can I take to make sure I remember to take PrEP regularly?
